Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' compared to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all rejection activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' does not happen

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' that are followed by 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' from all declarations processed by the SYSTEM resource
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' in relation to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' in variants leading to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases that were eventually paid
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' grouped by case:BudgetNumber
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases with a declaration number ending in odd vs even
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' in relation to total number of activities in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' does not happen

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' that lead to a 'Request Payment' activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' that occur after 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and before any approval
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases that do not proceed to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases where 'Payment Handled' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases with 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to identify patterns that may reduce the latter
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' in the total rejections by all administration levels
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' does not happen

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' in the first quarter of the year compared to the rest of the year
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases
